title: I want to create a NEW address book named "Ministry" in Thunderbird 128 - is this possible?
content:
I see THREE address book entries in Thunderbird 128. All Address Books Personal Address Book -my gmail account- Collected Addresses

It is POSSIBLE to create other address books? I WANT one named "Ministry" for specific activity contacts! Is Thunderbird NOT designed to handle this??? I can see that one might want a number of function/activity-specific books to deal with separately.
creator: phubert28

title: Fresh install
content: How to do a fresh install without knowing my primary password or do I delete everything and start from scratch.
creator: debandmikeb

title: Setting up email account
content: I successfully set up an icloud email account in Thunderbird on a laptop but cannot get it set up on a desktop. I am attempting to use the previously generated app-specific password. I think I remember that on the laptop I could not key the password, but had to copy and paste. If I generate another app-specific password, will it invalidate the password presently working on the laptop? Or am I missing something else?
creator: bob_pierce
